0.sl_source: Kadar igra, je videti tako resna.
0.en_source: She looks so serious when she plays
0.sl_trans: Ko igra, je videti tako resna

1.sl_source: Pa naši rogljički, kakšni so se ti zdeli?
1.en_source: And our croissants, what did you think of them?
1.sl_trans: In naši rogljički, kaj si mislite o njih?

4.en_source: it's the quality of the butter

6.en_source: Is that why you came every day?

7.sl_source: Veš, moja mama te ima zelo rada.
7.en_source: Because you know, my mother is very fond of you.
7.sl_trans: Saj veste, moja mati vas ima zelo rada.

8.sl_source: Po njenem bi se morala midva poleti poročiti.
8.en_source: In her opinion, we should get married in the summer.
8.sl_trans: Po njenem mnenju bi se morala poročiti poleti.

11.sl_source: Upam, da je zdaj bolj udobno.
11.sl_trans: Upam, da je to bolj udobno.

20.sl_source: Pridite si umit kri z obraza.
20.en_source: Now go and wash the blood off your face.
20.sl_trans: Zdaj si umij kri z obraza.

21.sl_source: Mornarica si je zaslužila večno hvaležnost.
21.en_source: The Navy has earned our undying gratitude.
21.sl_trans: Vojna mornarica si je prislužila našo neizmerno hvaležnost.

23.sl_source: Zaradi poguma so preživeli nepremagani in čvrstega duha.
23.en_source: Courage has brought them through unconquered, their spirit unbowed.
23.sl_trans: Pogum jih je popeljal skozi nepremagane, njihov duh pa je ostal nepokoren.

24.en_source: This is the epic of Dunkirk.

25.sl_source: To ime bo za vedno ostalo zapisano v kronikah vojskovanja.
25.en_source: A name that will live forever in the annals of warfare.
25.sl_trans: Ime, ki se bo za vedno zapisalo v anale vojskovanja.

26.sl_source: V sklopu obsežne turneje je kraljica Elizabeta obiskala tovarno čokolade na severu Anglije.
26.en_source: In the course of a comprehensive tour, Queen Elizabeth is seen here visiting a chocolate factory in the north of England.
26.sl_trans: Kraljica Elizabeta je med obsežnim potovanjem obiskala tovarno čokolade na severu Anglije.

27.sl_source: Čokoladni magnat in prijatelj britanske vojske g. Paul Marshall je kraljici razkazal tovarno, kjer izdelujejo čokolado Amo.
27.en_source: The confectionary magnate and friend of the British Army, Mr Paul Marshall, gave the Queen a tour of the Army Amo factory.
27.sl_trans: Magnat na področju slaščic in prijatelj britanske vojske Paul Marshall je kraljico popeljal na ogled tovarne Army Amo.

28.sl_source: V družbi svoje ljubke zaročenke gdč. Lole Quincey.
28.en_source: With his lovely, soon-to-be-wed fiancée, Miss Lola Quincey.
28.sl_trans: S svojo čudovito zaročenko, ki se bo kmalu poročila, gospo Lolo Quincey.

29.en_source: What a mouthwatering couple they are.

31.en_source: Our boys have a sweet tooth.

32.sl_source: Drugič, kot zdravilo proti grehu in v izogib nečistovanju, naj se osebe, ki nimajo daru vzdržnosti, poročijo in ostanejo čisti člani Kristusovega telesa.
32.en_source: Secondly, for a remedy against sin, and to avoid fornication, that such persons as have not the gift of continence, might marry and keep themselves undefiled members of Christ's body.
32.sl_trans: Drugič, kot zdravilo proti grehu in za preprečevanje nečistovanja, da bi se osebe, ki nimajo daru vzdržnosti, lahko poročile in se ohranile kot neokrnjeni člani Kristusovega telesa.

33.sl_source: Tretjič, predpisano je bilo za družbo, pomoč in tolažbo, da naj bi eden imel drugega.
33.en_source: Thirdly, it was ordained, for the mutual society, help and comfort, that the one ought to have the other.
33.sl_trans: Tretjič, za vzajemno družbo, pomoč in tolažbo je bilo določeno, da mora imeti eden drugega.

35.sl_source: Če kdo pozna upravičen razlog, zakaj se ne bi smela zakonito združiti.
35.en_source: Therefore, if any man can show any just cause why they may not be lawfully joined together.
35.sl_trans: Če torej kdo lahko pokaže kakršen koli upravičen razlog, zakaj se ne bi smela zakonito združiti.

36.sl_trans: Vem, da je bil to on.

37.sl_source: naj spregovori zdaj, ali pa za vedno molči.
37.en_source: let him now speak or forever hold his peace.
37.sl_trans: naj zdaj spregovori ali pa naj za vedno molči.

39.sl_source: Videla sem ga na lastne oči.
39.en_source: I saw him with my own eyes.
39.sl_trans: Videl sem ga na lastne oči.

41.en_source: They're going down to the country today.

42.en_source: Never been out of London before.
42.sl_trans: Še nikoli nisem bil zunaj Londona.

43.sl_source: Upam, da bodo dobili prijazno družino.
43.en_source: I hope they get a nice family.
43.sl_trans: Upam, da bosta dobila lepo družino.

44.sl_source: Ne vedo, kaj jih čaka s temi.
44.en_source: They don't know what they're in for with this lot.
44.sl_trans: Ne vedo, kaj jih čaka s tem paketom.

51.sl_source: Pisala sem ti, pa nisi odgovorila.

53.en_source: I have to talk to you.

54.en_source: So you're a ward sister now?
54.sl_trans: Torej si zdaj sestra v oddelku?

56.sl_source: Rada bi šla pred sodnika in spremenila svojo izjavo, Cee.
56.en_source: I want to go in front of a judge and change my evidence, Cee.
56.sl_trans: Rad bi stopil pred sodnika in spremenil svoje dokaze, Cee.

59.en_source: I know what I did was terrible.
59.sl_trans: Vem, da je bilo to, kar sem storil, grozno.

60.sl_source: Ne pričakujem, da mi boš odpustila.
60.en_source: I don't expect you to forgive me.
60.sl_trans: Ne pričakujem, da mi boste odpustili.

63.sl_trans: Primera ne bodo nikoli ponovno odprli.

64.sl_source: Vsaj drugim bi lahko povedala, kaj sem storila.
64.en_source: Well, at least I could tell everyone else what I did.
64.sl_trans: Vsaj vsem drugim sem lahko povedal, kaj sem naredil.

65.sl_source: Lahko bi šla domov in pojasnila mami, očetu in Leonu.
65.en_source: I can go home and explain to Mummy and Daddy and Leon.
65.sl_trans: Lahko grem domov in razložim mami, očetu in Leonu.

67.sl_source: Najprej sem hotela govoriti s tabo.
67.en_source: Well, I wanted to see you first.

68.en_source: They don't want to hear any more about it.
68.sl_trans: O tem ne želijo več slišati.

69.sl_source: Ta neprijetnost je lepo pospravljena v preteklost, hvala.
69.en_source: That unpleasantness is all tidied away in the past, thank you very much.
69.sl_trans: Vse te neprijetnosti so v preteklosti že pospravljene, hvala lepa.

76.en_source: She wanted to speak to me.

78.sl_trans: Strašna stvar, ki sem jo storil.

81.en_source: I'll be quite honest with you.

82.sl_source: Razpet sem med tem, da ti zlomim vrat tukaj, ali pa te odvlečem ven in te vržem po stopnicah.
82.en_source: I'm torn between breaking your neck here and taking you and throwing you down the stairs.
82.sl_trans: Razpet sem med tem, da bi ti tukaj zlomil vrat ali pa te vzel in vrgel po stopnicah.

84.sl_source: Se ti sploh sanja, kako je v zaporu?
84.en_source: Do you have any idea what it's like in jail?
84.sl_trans: Si sploh predstavljate, kako je v zaporu?

86.sl_source: Si uživala ob misli name v zaporu?
86.en_source: Tell me, did it give you pleasure to think of me inside?
86.sl_trans: Povej mi, ali ti je bilo prijetno misliti name?

88.en_source: But you did nothing about it.

90.sl_source: Misliš, da sem jaz napadel tvojo sestrično?
90.en_source: Do you think I assaulted your cousin?
90.sl_trans: Menite, da sem napadel vašega bratranca?

95.sl_source: In zakaj si zdaj tako prepričana?
95.en_source: And what's made you so certain now?
95.sl_trans: In zakaj ste zdaj tako prepričani?

99.sl_source: Koliko moraš biti star, da veš, kaj je prav in kaj narobe?
99.en_source: How old do you have to be to know the difference between right and wrong?
99.sl_trans: Koliko moraš biti star, da poznaš razliko med prav in narobe?

101.sl_source: Moraš imeti 18 let, preden si zmožna priznati laž?
101.en_source: Do you have to be 18 before you can bring yourself to own up to a lie?
101.sl_trans: Ali moraš biti star 18 let, preden se lahko zaveš, da boš priznal laž?

102.sl_source: 18-letni vojaki so dovolj stari, da jih pustijo umreti bo cesti.
102.en_source: There are soldiers of 18, old enough to be left to die by the side of the road,
102.sl_trans: Vojaki, stari 18 let, so dovolj stari, da jih pustijo umreti ob cesti,

105.sl_source: Pred petimi leti ti ni bilo mar, da bi povedala resnico.
105.en_source: Five years ago, you didn't care about telling the truth.
105.sl_trans: Pred petimi leti vam ni bilo mar za resnico.

106.sl_source: Ti in vsa tvoja družina ste domnevali, da sem kljub izobrazbi le malo boljši od služabnika!
106.en_source: You, all your family, you just assumed that for all my education, I was still little better than a servant.
106.sl_trans: Vi, vsa vaša družina, ste domnevali, da sem ob vsej svoji izobrazbi še vedno le malo boljša od služkinje.

108.sl_source: Zaradi tebe so se zbrali skupaj in me vrgli volkovom!
108.en_source: Thanks to you, they were able to close ranks and throw me to the fucking wolves!
108.sl_trans: Po tvoji zaslugi so lahko strnili vrste in me vrgli na svobodo volkovom!

111.sl_source: Robbie se mora javiti ob šestih in ujeti mora vlak.
111.en_source: Robbie has to report for duty at 6:00, and he's got a train to catch.
111.sl_trans: Robbie se mora v službo zglasiti ob 6:00 in mora ujeti vlak.

113.en_source: There are some things you're going to do for us.
113.sl_trans: Nekaj stvari boste naredili za nas.

114.sl_source: Takoj, ko boš mogla, boš šla k staršem in jim povedala vse, kar morajo vedeti, da se prepričajo, da si dala lažno izjavo.
114.en_source: You'll go to your parents as soon as you can, and you'll tell them everything they need to know to be convinced that the evidence you gave was false.
114.sl_trans: Čim prej boš šel k staršem in jim povedal vse, kar morajo vedeti, da bodo prepričani, da so bili dokazi, ki si jih dal, lažni.

115.sl_source: Šla boš k odvetniku, podala izjavo, jo pred pričami podpisala in izvod poslala nama.
115.en_source: You'll meet with a solicitor, make a statement, have it signed, witnessed, send copies to us.
115.sl_trans: Sestali se boste z odvetnikom, podali izjavo, jo podpisali in potrdili ter nam poslali kopije.

118.sl_source: Meni boš napisala podrobno pismo in pojasnila vse, kar se je dogajalo in pripeljalo do tega, da si rekla, da si me videla ob jezeru.
118.en_source: You'll write a detailed letter to me explaining everything that happened leading up to you saying you saw me by the lake.
118.sl_trans: Napisal mi boš podrobno pismo, v katerem boš pojasnil vse, kar se je zgodilo, da si rekel, da si me videl ob jezeru.

119.sl_source: Skušaj vključiti vse, česar se spomniš, da je tisti večer počel Danny Hardman.
119.en_source: Try to include whatever you can remember of what Danny Hardman was doing that night.
119.sl_trans: Poskusite vključiti vse, česar se spomnite o tem, kaj je Danny Hardman počel tisti večer.

123.sl_trans: To je bil Leonov prijatelj Marshall.

126.en_source: I've just come from their wedding.
126.sl_trans: Pravkar sem se vrnil z njune poroke.

129.sl_source: Zares mi je zelo žal za strašno gorje, ki sem ga povzročila.
129.en_source: I'm very, very sorry for the terrible distress that I have caused.
129.sl_trans: Zelo, zelo se opravičujem za strašno stisko, ki sem jo povzročil.

131.en_source: Just do as we've asked of you.
131.sl_trans: Naredite, kar smo od vas zahtevali.

132.en_source: Write it all down, just the truth, no rhymes.
132.sl_trans: Zapišite vse, samo resnico, brez rim.

134.sl_source: In potem naju pusti pri miru.

137.en_source: Could we stop for a moment?
137.sl_trans: Ali se lahko za trenutek ustavimo?

140.en_source: I just need a couple of minutes by myself.

141.sl_source: Briony Tallis, vaš novi roman, 21. po vrsti, ima naslov Atonement.
141.en_source: Briony Tallis, your new novel, your twenty-first is called Atonement.
141.sl_trans: Briony Tallis, vaš novi, enaindvajseti roman se imenuje Pokora.

144.en_source: Could we stop for a moment?
144.sl_trans: Ali se lahko za trenutek ustavimo?

145.sl_source: Briony Tallis, rad bi govoril o vašem novem romanu Atonement, ki izide čez nekaj dni, ob vašem rojstnem dnevu.
145.en_source: Briony Tallis, I'd like to talk now about your new novel, Atonement, which comes out in a few days to coincide with your birthday.
145.sl_trans: Briony Tallis, zdaj bi se rada pogovarjala o vašem novem romanu Pokora, ki bo izšel čez nekaj dni ob vašem rojstnem dnevu.

151.sl_source: Zdravnik pravi, da imam vaskularno demenco, kar je v bistvu vrsta majhnih kapi.
151.en_source: My doctor tells me I have something called vascular dementia, which is essentially a continuous series of tiny strokes.
151.sl_trans: Zdravnik mi je povedal, da imam tako imenovano vaskularno demenco, ki je v bistvu neprekinjen niz drobnih kapi.

152.sl_source: Možgani se izklopijo, postopoma izgubljaš besede, spomin, kar je za pisateljico bistvo.
152.en_source: Your brain closes down, gradually you lose words, you lose your memory, which for a writer is pretty much the point.
152.sl_trans: Možgani se zapirajo, postopoma izgubljate besede in spomin, kar je za pisatelja v bistvu bistvo.

153.sl_source: Zato sem končno lahko napisala to knjigo, morala sem jo.
153.en_source: So that's why I could finally write the book, I think.
153.sl_trans: Mislim, da sem zato končno lahko napisal knjigo.

154.sl_source: In zato je to moj zadnji roman.

155.sl_source: Čudno pa je, da bi jo lahko imenovali tudi moj prvi roman.
155.en_source: And why, of course, it's my last novel.
155.sl_trans: In zakaj je to seveda moj zadnji roman.

156.sl_source: Več osnutkov sem napisala že med vojno v bolnici St.
156.en_source: Strangely enough, it would be just as accurate to call it my first novel.
156.sl_trans: Nenavadno je, da bi bilo prav tako natančno, če bi ga imenovali moj prvi roman.

157.en_source: I wrote several drafts as far back as my time at St Thomas' Hospital during the War.
157.sl_trans: Več osnutkov sem napisal že v času, ko sem bil med vojno v bolnišnici St Thomas'.

158.sl_source: Samo nisem je znala napisati prav.
158.en_source: I just couldn't ever find the way to do it.
158.sl_trans: Samo nikoli nisem našel načina, kako to narediti.

159.en_source: Because the novel is autobiographical, is that right?
159.sl_trans: Ker je roman avtobiografski, je tako?

161.sl_source: Nisem spreminjala imen, niti svojega ne.
161.en_source: I haven't changed any names, including my own.
161.sl_trans: Nisem spremenil nobenega imena, vključno s svojim.

162.sl_trans: In ali je bila težava v tem?

164.sl_source: Že davno sem sklenila, da povem resnico.
164.en_source: I had, for a very long time, decided to tell the absolute truth.
164.sl_trans: Dolgo sem se odločal, da bom govoril resnico.

167.sl_source: Knjigo ste prebrali, razumeli boste, zakaj.
167.en_source: You've read the book, you'll understand why.
167.sl_trans: Če ste prebrali knjigo, boste razumeli, zakaj.

168.sl_source: Iz prve roke sem dobila opise dogodkov, ki jih sama nisem videla, razmer v zaporu, evakuacije pri Dunkirku, vsega.
168.en_source: I got first-hand accounts of all the events I didn't personally witness, the conditions in prison, the evacuation to Dunkirk everything.
168.sl_trans: Iz prve roke sem dobil poročila o vseh dogodkih, ki jim nisem bil osebno priča, o razmerah v zaporu, o evakuaciji v Dunkerque, o vsem.

169.sl_source: Učinek te iskrenosti pa je bil neusmiljen.
169.en_source: But the effect of all this honesty was rather pitiless.
169.sl_trans: Vendar je bil učinek vse te iskrenosti precej neusmiljen.

170.sl_source: Nisem si več predstavljala, čemu bi to služilo.
170.en_source: You see, I couldn't any longer imagine what purpose would be served by it.
170.sl_trans: Veste, nisem si več mogel predstavljati, kakšnemu namenu bi to lahko služilo.

176.sl_source: Ker sem bila v resnici preveč strahopetna, da bi junija 1940 obiskala svojo sestro.
176.en_source: Because, in fact, I was too much of a coward to go and see my sister in June, 1940.
176.sl_trans: Pravzaprav sem bil prevelik strahopetec, da bi šel junija 1940 obiskat sestro.

177.en_source: I never made that journey to Balham.

178.sl_source: Se ti sploh sanja, kako je v zaporu?
178.en_source: Do you have any idea what it's like in jail?
178.sl_trans: Si sploh predstavljate, kako je v zaporu?

179.sl_source: Prizor, v katerem jima priznam, je izmišljen.
179.en_source: So the scene in which I confess to them is imagined.
179.sl_trans: Zato si prizor, v katerem se jim izpovedujem, predstavljam.

182.sl_source: Koliko moraš biti star, da veš, kaj je prav in kaj narobe?
182.en_source: How old do you have to be to know the difference between right and wrong?
182.sl_trans: Koliko moraš biti star, da poznaš razliko med prav in narobe?

183.sl_source: Pravzaprav se ne bi mogel zgoditi.
183.en_source: And, in fact, could never have happened.
183.sl_trans: Pravzaprav se to nikoli ne bi moglo zgoditi.

184.sl_source: Ker je Robbie Turner zaradi sepse umrl v Bray-Dunesu 1. junija 1940, na zadnji dan evakuacije.
184.en_source: Because Robbie Turner died of septicaemia at Bray-Dunes on June the first, 1940, the last day of the evacuation.
184.sl_trans: Ker je Robbie Turner umrl za septikemijo v Bray-Dunes 1. junija 1940, zadnji dan evakuacije.

186.sl_source: In tudi s svojo sestro Cecilio se nisem mogla pobotati, ker je bila ubita 15. oktobra 1940, ko je bomba uničila plinsko in vodno napeljavo nad postajo Balham.
186.en_source: And I was never able to put things right with my sister, Cecilia, because she was killed on the 15th of October, 1940, by the bomb that destroyed the gas and water mains above Balham tube station.
186.sl_trans: S sestro Cecilijo nisem mogel nikoli ničesar popraviti, saj jo je 15. oktobra 1940 ubila bomba, ki je uničila plinsko in vodovodno omrežje nad postajo podzemne železnice Balham.

187.sl_source: Moja sestra in Robbie nista mogla nikoli živeti skupaj, kar sta si oba tako želela in sta si zaslužila.
187.en_source: My sister and Robbie were never able to have the time together they both so longed for, and deserved.
187.sl_trans: Moja sestra in Robbie nikoli nista mogla preživeti skupnega časa, po katerem sta tako hrepenela in ki sta si ga zaslužila.

188.sl_source: Od takrat čutim, da sem jaz to onemogočila.
188.en_source: Ever since I've always felt I prevented.
188.sl_trans: Od takrat sem vedno čutil, da sem preprečil.

189.sl_source: Ampak kakšno upanje ali zadovoljstvo bi imel bralec ob takem koncu?
189.en_source: But what sense of hope, or satisfaction, could a reader derive from an ending like that?
189.sl_trans: Toda kakšen občutek upanja ali zadovoljstva lahko bralec dobi iz takšnega konca?

190.sl_source: Zato sem v knjigi Robbieju in Cecilii dala tisto, kar sta izgubila v življenju.
190.en_source: So, in the book, I wanted to give Robbie and Cecilia what they lost out on in life.
190.sl_trans: Zato sem v knjigi želel Robbiju in Ceciliji dati tisto, kar sta v življenju izgubila.

191.sl_source: Domišljam si, da to ni šibkost ali izmikanje, pač pa zadnje dejanje dobrote.
191.en_source: I'd like to think this isn't weakness or evasion, but a final act of kindness.
191.sl_trans: Rad bi mislil, da to ni šibkost ali izmikanje, ampak zadnje dejanje prijaznosti.

196.en_source: Well, she'll be in the drawing room, I expect.
196.sl_trans: Pričakujem, da bo v dnevni sobi.

197.sl_source: Upam, da nam danes ne boste v napoto, gdč. Briony.
197.en_source: I hope you're not gonna be getting under our feet today, Miss Briony.
197.sl_trans: Upam, da nam danes ne boste stopili pod noge, gospa Briony.

198.en_source: We got a dinner for 10 to prepare.

199.en_source: I hear you're putting on a play.

201.en_source: Will you come and see it?

202.sl_source: Ne vem, če bi bilo to ravno primerno.
202.en_source: I'm not sure that would be quite appropriate.
202.sl_trans: Nisem prepričan, da bi bilo to povsem primerno.

203.en_source: Why don't you let me read it?
203.sl_trans: Zakaj mi je ne daš prebrati?

204.sl_source: Včasih si zame delala čudovite vezane izvode svojih zgodb.
204.en_source: You used to make me those beautiful bound copies of all your stories.
204.sl_trans: Včasih si mi pripravljala čudovite vezane izvode vseh svojih zgodb.

206.en_source: I still want you to come.

214.en_source: Do you think Leon will like it?

216.en_source: The Trials of Arabella, by Briony Tallis.
216.sl_trans: The Trials of Arabella, avtorica Briony Tallis.

217.sl_source: Kaj misliš, kako bi bilo, če bi bila kdo drug?
217.en_source: What do you think it would feel like to be someone else?
217.sl_trans: Kako bi se počutili, če bi bili nekdo drug?

220.en_source: But we only have the afternoon to rehearse.
220.sl_trans: Toda za vaje imamo na voljo le popoldne.

221.sl_source: Kaj, če dvojčka ne znata igrati?
221.en_source: What if the twins can't act?
221.sl_trans: Kaj če dvojčka ne znata igrati?

222.en_source: You have to be nice to them.

223.sl_source: Mogoče bi morala Leonu napisati zgodbo.
223.en_source: Perhaps I should have written Leon a story.
223.sl_trans: Morda bi moral Leonu napisati zgodbo.

224.sl_source: Če pišeš zgodbo, samo napišeš besedo grad, pa že vidiš stolpe in gozd in vas pod njim.
224.en_source: If you write a story, you only have to say the word castle, and you could see the towers and the woods and the village below.
224.sl_trans: Če pišeš zgodbo, moraš le izreči besedo grad, pa že lahko vidiš stolpe, gozdove in vas pod njimi.

225.en_source: It all depends on other people.
225.sl_trans: Vse je odvisno od drugih ljudi.

226.sl_source: Zakaj ne govoriš več z Robbiejem?
226.en_source: Why don't you talk to Robbie any more?
226.sl_trans: Zakaj se ne pogovarjaš več z Robbiejem?

228.sl_source: Samo v različnih krogih se gibljeva.
228.en_source: We just move in different circles, that's all.
228.sl_trans: Preprosto se gibljemo v različnih krogih, to je vse.

229.en_source: Do we have to do a play?

231.sl_source: V čast obiska mojega brata Leona.
231.en_source: It's to celebrate my brother Leon's visit.
231.sl_trans: To je praznovanje obiska mojega brata Leona.

236.sl_source: Igrala bosta, ali pa jih dobita.
236.en_source: You'll be in this play or you'll get a clout.
236.sl_trans: V tej igri boš sodeloval ali pa boš dobil klofuto.

238.en_source: You're not allowed to clout us.

240.sl_source: In kaj so rekli starši, da moramo biti?
240.en_source: And what did the parents say we were to make ourselves?
240.sl_trans: In kaj so nam starši rekli, da moramo narediti sami?

246.sl_source: Briony, za kaj gre v tvoji igri?
246.en_source: Now, Briony, what's your play about?
246.sl_trans: Briony, o čem je tvoja igra?

247.sl_source: Govori o tem, da je ljubezen že v redu, vendar moraš biti razsoden.
247.en_source: Well, it's about how love is all very well, but you have to be sensible.
247.sl_trans: Govori o tem, da je ljubezen zelo dobra, vendar moraš biti razumen.

248.en_source: I suppose you're going to be Arabella.

250.en_source: In that case, do you mind if I play her?
250.sl_trans: V tem primeru, ali imaš kaj proti, če jo odigram?

251.sl_source: Lola je nastopila v šolski igri.
251.en_source: Lola was in the school play.
251.sl_trans: Lola je igrala v šolski predstavi.

253.sl_source: To bo prva dobra stvar, ki se mi je zgodila v več mesecih.
253.en_source: It'd be the first decent thing to happen to me in months.
253.sl_trans: To bi bila prva spodobna stvar, ki bi se mi zgodila v zadnjih mesecih.

255.sl_source: Najbrž bi morali začeti z branjem.
255.en_source: I suppose we should start by reading it.
255.sl_trans: Predvidevam, da bi jo morali najprej prebrati.

256.sl_source: Če boš ti Arabella, bom jaz režiserka, hvala.
256.en_source: If you're going to be Arabella, then I'll be the director, thank you very much.
256.sl_trans: Če boš ti Arabella, bom jaz režiser, hvala lepa.

258.en_source: I'm going to do the prologue.

260.sl_source: To je zgodba o spontani Arabelli, ki je pobegnila z nepomembnim možakom.
260.en_source: This is the tale of spontaneous Arabella, who ran away with an extrinsic fellow.
260.sl_trans: To je zgodba o spontani Arabelli, ki je pobegnila z zunanjim fantom.

261.sl_source: Njene starše je žalostilo, da je njihova prvorojenka izginila od doma v Eastbourne.
261.en_source: It grieved her parents to see their firstborn evanesce from her home to go to Eastbourne.
261.sl_trans: Njeni starši so bili žalostni, ko so videli, da se je njihova prvorojenka izmuznila od doma in odšla v Eastbourne.

264.en_source: You can see the play this evening.
264.sl_trans: Igro si lahko ogledate danes zvečer.

267.en_source: Can we go for a swim now?

268.en_source: No, I don't really think there's time!

270.sl_source: Pol ure odmora nam bo koristilo.
270.en_source: I'm sure a half-hour break would do us all good.
270.sl_trans: Prepričan sem, da bi nam polurni odmor prišel prav.

271.en_source: Please, can we go for a swim, Cecilia?
271.sl_trans: Cecilia, prosim, ali lahko gremo plavat?

272.en_source: Yes, I don't see why not.

273.en_source: Don't go out of your depth!

274.sl_source: Mi zviješ eno svojih boljševiških cigaret?
274.en_source: Can you do me one of your Bolshevik roll-ups?
274.sl_trans: Ali mi lahko narediš enega od svojih boljševiških zvitkov?

283.sl_source: Si vedel, da danes pride Leon?
283.en_source: Leon's coming down today, did you know?

285.en_source: He's bringing a friend with him.

286.en_source: It's Paul Marshall, the chocolate millionaire.
286.sl_trans: To je Paul Marshall, čokoladni milijonar.

290.en_source: The Old Man telephoned last night.

291.en_source: He says you're planning on being a doctor.

294.en_source: How else do you become a doctor?

295.en_source: You could get a fellowship, now, couldn't you?
295.sl_trans: Zdaj bi lahko dobili štipendijo, kajne?

298.sl_source: Saj sem rekel, da bom tvojemu očetu vrnil.
298.en_source: I said I'd pay your father back.
298.sl_trans: Rekel sem, da bom vašemu očetu vrnil denar.

299.en_source: That's not what I meant at all.
299.sl_trans: Tega sploh nisem imel v mislih.

301.en_source: No, I'm all right, thanks. Take the flowers.
301.sl_trans: Ne, z mano je vse v redu, hvala. Vzemite rože.

303.sl_trans: Z mano je vse v redu.

305.sl_source: Veš, da je to najbrž naša največja dragocenost?
305.en_source: Do you realise that's probably the most valuable thing we own?
305.sl_trans: Ali se zavedate, da je to verjetno najdragocenejša stvar, ki jo imamo?

321.sl_source: Tu se mi je že mešalo.
321.en_source: I've been going completely doolally up here.

324.en_source: I've heard an awful lot about you.
324.sl_trans: O tebi sem slišal že zelo veliko.

329.en_source: She's got one of her migraines.

330.en_source: I'm not surprised, with this heat.
330.sl_trans: Ob tej vročini me to ne preseneča.

331.sl_source: V veliko sobo zraven otroške sobe.
331.en_source: It's the big room next to the nursery.
331.sl_trans: To je velika soba poleg otroške sobe.

332.en_source: Is the Old Man staying in town?
332.sl_trans: Ali bo starec ostal v mestu?

334.en_source: Some sort of rush on at the Ministry.
334.sl_trans: Na ministrstvu se je začela nekakšna naglica.

335.en_source: So aren't we doing the play?

340.sl_source: Ko se pojavi nova znamka, so vedno težave.
340.en_source: There's always a problem when a new brand comes about.
340.sl_trans: Ob nastanku nove blagovne znamke se vedno pojavi težava.

341.en_source: The remarketing, the re-packaging, the re-shaping.
341.sl_trans: Ponovno trženje, ponovno pakiranje, ponovno oblikovanje.

342.sl_source: Včasih celo nov okus ali čisto nova tehnologija.
342.en_source: Even the re-flavouring in some cases, or whole new technology.
342.sl_trans: V nekaterih primerih celo s spremembo arome ali povsem novo tehnologijo.

343.sl_source: Ne vemo, ali naj začnemo z novo čokolado Amo.
343.en_source: I think our main challenge is whether or not to launch the new Amo Bar.
343.sl_trans: Mislim, da je naš glavni izziv, ali naj uvedemo nov bar Amo ali ne.

344.sl_source: Moj vir na ministrstvu je zanesljiv.
344.en_source: My source at the Ministry is very reliable.
344.sl_trans: Moj vir na ministrstvu je zelo zanesljiv.

345.sl_source: Na Harrowu sem mu čistil čevlje.
345.en_source: I used to clean his shoes at Harrow.
345.sl_trans: V Harrowu sem mu čistil čevlje.

346.sl_source: Pravi, da je možno, da jo bodo vključili v standardni vojaški obrok.
346.en_source: He informs me we have a good chance of including it in the standard issue ration pack.
346.sl_trans: Obvestil me je, da imamo dobre možnosti, da ga vključimo v standardni paket obrokov.

347.sl_source: Kar pomeni, da bi moral odpreti vsaj še tri tovarne.
347.en_source: Which means that I'd have to open at least three more factories.
347.sl_trans: To pomeni, da bi moral odpreti vsaj še tri tovarne.

348.sl_source: Še več, če bodo uvedli nabor, kar se bo po mojem zgodilo, če se herr Hitler ne bo umiril.
348.en_source: More if they bring in conscription, which I say is bound to happen if Herr Hitler doesn't pipe down.
348.sl_trans: Še več, če bodo uvedli naborništvo, kar se bo zagotovo zgodilo, če se gospod Hitler ne bo umiril.

349.sl_source: Tega ne bo naredil, kot ne bo kupil delnic Marksa Spencerja, ne?
349.en_source: He's about as likely to do that as buy shares in Marks and Spencer's, wouldn't you agree?
349.sl_trans: Verjetno je, da bo to storil, kot da bi kupil delnice podjetja Marks and Spencer's, se strinjate?

352.sl_source: Ugani, koga sva srečala ob prihodu.
352.en_source: Guess who we met on the way in?
352.sl_trans: Uganite, koga smo srečali na poti do hotela?

354.sl_source: Rekel sem mu, naj nocoj pride.
354.en_source: I told him to join us tonight.
354.sl_trans: Rekel sem mu, naj se nam pridruži nocoj.

356.sl_source: Robbie, gospodinjin sin, čigar oče je pred 20 leti odšel, dobi štipendijo za gimnazijo, Stari ga šola na Cambridgu, tja gre istočasno kot Cee, ki tri leta skoraj ne govori z njim.
356.en_source: So, Robbie, the housekeeper's son, whose father did a bunk 20 years ago, gets a scholarship to the local grammar, the Old Man puts him through Cambridge, goes up at the same time as Cee, and for three years she hardly speaks to him.
356.sl_trans: Tako Robbie, gospodičin sin, čigar oče je pred dvajsetimi leti opravil pograd, dobi štipendijo za lokalno gimnazijo, starešina ga vpiše na Cambridge, kamor gre hkrati s Cee, in tri leta z njim skorajda ne govori.

357.sl_source: Niti blizu mu ni pustila svojim roedeanskim prijateljicam.
357.en_source: Wouldn't let him within a mile of her Roedean chums.
357.sl_trans: Ne bi ga pustila niti na miljo od svojih roedeanskih prijateljev.

359.sl_source: Ne vem, zakaj, hudiča, zdaj brska po našem vrtu.
359.en_source: I don't know what the hell he's doing these days, messing about in flower beds.
359.sl_trans: Ne vem, kaj za vraga počne te dni, ko se igra v cvetličnih gredicah.

360.en_source: As a matter of fact, he's planning on doing a medical degree.

361.en_source: And the Old Man said yes to that?

362.sl_source: Moral bi dol v kočo in ga prositi, naj ne hodi.
362.en_source: Look, I really think you should go down to the lodge and ask him not to come.
362.sl_trans: Resnično mislim, da bi morala iti v kočo in ga prositi, naj ne pride.

372.sl_source: Nikoli več ne uporabi te besede!
372.en_source: You will never, ever use that word again!
372.sl_trans: Te besede ne boste nikoli več uporabili!

374.en_source: Now what are we going to do?

377.sl_source: Vi ste pa sorodniki s severa.
377.en_source: You must be the cousins from the north.
377.sl_trans: Vi ste gotovo bratranci s severa.

383.sl_source: V časopisu sem bral o njih.
383.en_source: Well, I've read about them in the paper.
383.sl_trans: O njih sem brala v časopisu.

384.sl_source: In kaj ste brali o njih?
384.en_source: What exactly have you read about them?
384.sl_trans: Kaj točno ste prebrali o njih?

385.en_source: Oh, you know, the usual sort of nonsense.

386.sl_source: Prosim, če vpričo otrok ne govorite o tem.
386.en_source: I'll thank you not to talk about this in front of the children.
386.sl_trans: Zahvaljujem se vam, da o tem ne govorite pred otroki.

387.sl_source: Vaša starša sta čudovita človeka, to je čisto jasno.
387.en_source: Your parents are absolutely wonderful people, that's quite clear.
387.sl_trans: Vaši starši so čudoviti ljudje, to je povsem jasno.

388.sl_source: Rada vas imata in ves čas mislita na vas.
388.en_source: They love you and think about you all the time.
388.sl_trans: Radi vas imajo in ves čas mislijo na vas.

390.sl_source: Na predstavo smo šli, pa sem jih dobila pri Libertyju.
390.en_source: We went to see a show and I got them at Liberty's.
390.sl_trans: Ogledali smo si predstavo in dobila sem jih v Liberty's.

397.en_source: They make a wooden thing, shaped like your foot.
397.sl_trans: Izdelali so leseno stvar v obliki vašega stopala.

401.sl_source: Mogoče ti lahko pomagam, če uganeš, s čim se preživljam.
401.en_source: Well, I might be able to help you there, if you can guess what I do for a living.
401.sl_trans: Morda vam bom pri tem lahko pomagal, če boste uganili, od česa živim.

404.sl_source: Potem pa to ni bilo ugibanje, ne?
404.en_source: Then it wasn't a guess, was it?
404.sl_trans: Potem to ni bilo ugibanje, kajne?

405.sl_source: Ena teh bo v opremi vsakega vojaka v britanski vojski.
405.en_source: There'll be one of these in every kit bag of every soldier in the British Army.
405.sl_trans: Vsak vojak britanske vojske bo imel v svoji torbi eno takšno napravo.

406.sl_source: Oblita s sladkorjem, da se ne topi.
406.en_source: Sugar casing, so it won't melt.
406.sl_trans: Sladkorna obloga, da se ne stopi.

407.en_source: Why should they get free sweets?
407.sl_trans: Zakaj bi morali dobiti brezplačne sladkarije?

408.sl_source: Ker se bodo borili za domovino.
408.en_source: 'Cause they'll be fighting for their country.
408.sl_trans: Ker se bodo borili za svojo državo.

409.sl_source: Očka pravi, da vojne ne bo.
409.en_source: Our daddy says there isn't going to be a war.
409.sl_trans: Naš oče pravi, da vojne ne bo.

414.sl_source: Dolgočasno je, da se vse konča na o.
414.en_source: It's boring how everything ends in o.
414.sl_trans: Nudno je, kako se vse konča z o.

417.en_source: Sounds as if you don't want it.
417.sl_trans: Sliši se, kot da je ne želite.

418.sl_source: Jo bom moral dati pa vajini sestri.
418.en_source: Then I shall just have to give it to your sister.
418.sl_trans: Potem ga bom moral dati tvoji sestri.

421.sl_source: Princesa je dobro vedela za njegovo okrutno zlobo.
421.en_source: The Princess was well aware of his remorseless wickedness.
421.sl_trans: Princesa se je dobro zavedala njegove brezobzirne hudobije.

422.sl_source: A to ni prav nič pomagalo proti ljubezni, ki jo je čutila do sira Romulusa.
422.en_source: But that made it no easier to overcome the voluminous love she felt in her heart for Sir Romulus.
422.sl_trans: Vendar ji zaradi tega ni bilo nič lažje premagati velike ljubezni, ki jo je v srcu čutila do sira Romula.

423.sl_source: Princesa je nagonsko vedela, da rdečelascu ni zaupati.
423.en_source: The Princess knew instinctively that the one with red hair was not to be trusted.
423.sl_trans: Princesa je instinktivno vedela, da tistemu z rdečimi lasmi ne sme zaupati.

424.sl_source: Ko se je njegov mladi varovanec vedno znova potapljal v jezero, da bi našel čarobno kupo, je sir Romulus vrtel svoje košate brke.
424.en_source: As his young ward dived again and again to the depths of the lake, in search of the enchanted chalice, Sir Romulus twirled his luxuriant moustache.
424.sl_trans: Medtem ko se je njegov mladi varovanec vedno znova potapljal v globine jezera in iskal čarobni kelih, si je sir Romulus vrtel svoje bujne muce.

425.sl_source: Sir Romulus je s spremljevalcema jezdil na sever, vedno bližje žarečemu morju.
425.en_source: Sir Romulus rode with his two companions, northwards, drawing ever closer to an effulgent sea.
425.sl_trans: Sir Romulus je s svojima spremljevalcema jezdil proti severu in se vedno bolj bližal sijočemu morju.

426.sl_source: Imel je tako junaški nastop, tako pogumno je govoril, da ne bi nihče uganil, kakšna tema preži v črnem srcu sira Romulusa Turnbulla.
426.en_source: So heroic in manner, he appeared so valiant in word no one could ever guess at the darkness lurking in the black heart of Sir Romulus Turnbull.
426.sl_trans: Bil je tako junaški v obnašanju in tako pogumen v besedah, da nihče nikoli ni mogel uganiti, kakšna tema se skriva v črnem srcu sira Romulusa Turnbulla.

427.sl_source: Bil je najbolj nevaren človek na svetu.
427.en_source: He was the most dangerous man in the world.
427.sl_trans: Bil je najnevarnejši človek na svetu.

428.sl_source: Draga Cecilia, menil sem, da se ti moram opravičiti za moje nerodno in nepremišljeno vedenje.
428.en_source: Dear Cecilia, I thought I should write to apologise for my clumsy and inconsiderate behaviour.
428.sl_trans: Draga Cecilia, mislil sem, da bi se vam moral opravičiti za svoje nerodno in brezobzirno vedenje.

429.sl_source: Draga Cecilia, nihče ti ne bi zameril, če bi me imela za norega, ko sem se danes tako vedel.
429.en_source: Dear Cecilia, you'd be forgiven for thinking me mad, the way I acted this afternoon.
429.sl_trans: Draga Cecilia, odpustili bi vam, če bi me imeli za norega, glede na to, kako sem se obnašal danes popoldne.

430.sl_source: Dejstvo je, da sem ob tebi, Cee, lahkomiseln in nespameten.
430.en_source: The truth is I feel rather lightheaded and foolish in your presence, Cee.
430.sl_trans: Resnica je, da se v tvoji prisotnosti počutim precej lahkotno in neumno, Cee.

431.sl_source: In za to ni kriva vročina.
431.en_source: I don't think I can blame the heat.
431.sl_trans: Mislim, da ne morem kriviti vročine.

435.sl_source: Ja, Leon me je povabil na večerjo.
435.en_source: Yes, Leon's asked me to join them for dinner.
435.sl_trans: Da, Leon me je povabil, naj se jima pridružim pri večerji.

436.sl_source: Zato sem vse popoldne loščila srebro.
436.en_source: So that's why I've been polishing silver all afternoon.
436.sl_trans: Zato že vse popoldne loščim srebro.

437.sl_source: Pomislil bom nate, ko se bom zagledal v žlici.
437.en_source: I'll think of you when I see my face in the spoon.
437.sl_trans: Na vas bom pomislil, ko bom videl svoj obraz v žlici.

438.en_source: You're not a bit like your father.
438.sl_trans: Niti malo niste podobni svojemu očetu.

442.sl_trans: Vaše srajce visijo v zgornjem nadstropju.

448.sl_trans: Je z vami vse v redu?

449.en_source: Do you think you could do me a favour?
449.sl_trans: Misliš, da bi mi lahko naredil uslugo?

450.en_source: Could you run ahead and give this to Cee?
450.sl_trans: Lahko greš naprej in to daš Cee?

451.sl_source: Neumno se mi zdi, da bi ji ga dal sam.
451.en_source: I feel a bit of a fool handing it over myself.
451.sl_trans: Sam se počutim malce neumno, ko ga izročam.

455.en_source: I suppose he's what you might call eligible.
455.sl_trans: Mislim, da bi mu lahko rekli, da je primeren.

457.sl_source: Vsekakor se ima za zelo privlačnega.
457.en_source: He certainly seems to think he's the cat's pyjamas.
457.sl_trans: Vsekakor se mu zdi, da misli, da je mačja pižama.

458.sl_source: Kar je čudno glede na to, da mu iz ušes rastejo sramne dlake.
458.en_source: Which is odd, considering he has pubic hair growing out of his ears.
458.sl_trans: Kar je nenavadno, saj mu iz ušes rastejo pubične dlake.

459.sl_source: Verjetno bi ti dal veliko hrupnih, neumnih sinov.
459.en_source: I should imagine he'd give you a lot of very noisy, boneheaded sons.
459.sl_trans: Predstavljam si, da bi vam dal veliko zelo glasnih in nagajivih sinov.

460.sl_source: V bistvu je čisto v redu.
460.en_source: He's quite a good egg, actually.

463.en_source: Rummy, if it ain't my little sis!
463.sl_trans: Rummy, če ne gre za mojo sestrico!

464.en_source: I wrote you a play, Leon.

465.en_source: I wanted to do a play for you.
465.sl_trans: Za vas sem želel napisati igro.

468.en_source: Doesn't have to be this evening.
468.sl_trans: Ni nujno, da bo to danes zvečer.

471.sl_source: Dobro oponašam glasove, ti še bolje, pa jo bova prebrala po večerji.
471.en_source: Tell you what. I'm good at voices, you're even better, so we'll read it out after dinner.
471.sl_trans: Kaj vam povem. Jaz sem dober v glasovih, ti pa še boljši, zato ga bova prebrala po večerji.

480.en_source: Do you mind if I come in?

481.en_source: I've had the most appalling evening.

488.sl_source: Mislita, da ju jaz zadržujem tukaj.
488.en_source: They think it's me that's keeping them here.
488.sl_trans: Mislijo, da sem jaz tisti, ki jih drži tukaj.

493.sl_source: Katera je najhujša beseda, ki si jo lahko predstavljaš?
493.en_source: What's the worst word you can possibly imagine?
493.sl_trans: Katero najhujšo besedo si lahko predstavljate?

498.en_source: You ought to call the police.

500.sl_source: Napisal je, da ves dan misli na to.
500.en_source: He said he thought about it all day long.
500.sl_trans: Rekel je, da je o tem razmišljal ves dan.

501.en_source: All you have to do is show them the letter.
501.sl_trans: Vse, kar morate storiti, je, da jim pokažete pismo.

502.en_source: You won't tell anyone, will you, promise?
502.sl_trans: Nikomur ne boš povedala, obljubi, da ne boš?

505.sl_source: Kdo ve, kaj bi naredil, če bi izvedel.
505.en_source: If he found out, there's no knowing what he might do.
505.sl_trans: Če bi to izvedel, ne bi vedel, kaj bi lahko storil.

507.sl_trans: Bolje je, da si urediš obraz.

514.sl_trans: Moj bog, tako mi je žal.

516.sl_source: Nihče ga ne bi smel prebrati.
516.en_source: It was never meant to be read.

517.sl_source: In kaj je pisalo v različici, ki naj bi jo prebrala?
517.en_source: What was in the version I was meant to read?
517.sl_trans: Kaj je bilo v različici, ki sem jo moral prebrati?

521.sl_source: Že tedne sem čutila tako in danes zjutraj pri vodnjaku.
521.en_source: It's been there for weeks, and then this morning by the fountain.
521.sl_trans: Tam je bil že več tednov, danes zjutraj pa ob vodnjaku.

522.en_source: I've never done anything like that before.
522.sl_trans: Še nikoli nisem naredil česa podobnega.

523.sl_source: In bila sem zelo jezna nate in nase.
523.en_source: And I was so angry with you and with myself.
523.sl_trans: Bila sem tako jezna nate in nase.

524.sl_source: Mislila sem, da bom srečna, ko boš šel študirat medicino.
524.en_source: I thought if you went away to medical school, then I'd be happy.
524.sl_trans: Mislil sem, da bom srečen, če boš odšla na medicinsko fakulteto.

525.sl_source: Ne vem, kako sem bila lahko tako nevedna glede sebe.
525.en_source: I don't know how I could have been so ignorant about myself.
525.sl_trans: Ne vem, kako sem lahko bil tako neveden o sebi.

527.sl_source: Saj veš, o čem govorim, kajne?
527.en_source: You do know what I'm talking about, don't you?
527.sl_trans: Saj veste, o čem govorim, kajne?

538.sl_source: Ljudje so večerjali zunaj na pločniku.
538.en_source: People were sitting out having dinner on the pavement.
538.sl_trans: Ljudje so sedeli na pločniku in večerjali.

539.sl_source: Moji starši so menili, da vroče vreme spodbuja nemoralo.
539.en_source: It was always the view of my parents that hot weather encouraged loose morals.
539.sl_trans: Moji starši so vedno menili, da vročina spodbuja ohlapno moralo.

540.sl_source: Poleti s sestro nisva smeli iz hiše.
540.en_source: In high summer, my sister and I were never allowed out of the house.
540.sl_trans: Poleti s sestro nikoli nisva smeli iz hiše.

541.sl_source: Menila sta, da bi po nepotrebnem izzivali vaščane.
541.en_source: They thought the villagers would be unnecessarily provoked.
541.sl_trans: Menili so, da bodo vaščani po nepotrebnem izzveneli.

543.en_source: Does the hot weather make you behave badly?
543.sl_trans: Ali se zaradi vročega vremena obnašate slabo?

545.en_source: It's just hot in here, that's all.
545.sl_trans: Tu je samo vroče, to je vse.

549.en_source: What sins have you committed today?

551.en_source: Have you seen the twins recently?

552.sl_source: Ko sem ju zadnjič videl, nista bila videti zadovoljna, revčka.
552.en_source: They didn't look very happy last time I saw them, poor little chaps.
552.sl_trans: Ko sem ju nazadnje videl, nista bila videti preveč srečna, uboga malčka.

555.en_source: I can't imagine what's got into you.
555.sl_trans: Ne morem si predstavljati, kaj je prišlo v vas.

556.en_source: I've never known you to be so rude.
556.sl_trans: Še nikoli nisem vedel, da bi bil tako nesramen.

557.en_source: Well, they're not poor little chaps.

558.en_source: Just look what they did to Lola.
558.sl_trans: Samo poglejte, kaj so naredili Loli.

560.sl_source: Jackson in Pierrot sta ji naredila indijanski ogenj.
560.en_source: Jackson and Pierrot bruised her arm.
560.sl_trans: Jackson in Pierrot sta ji poškodovala roko.

563.sl_source: Tako sem dobil svojo bojno rano.
563.en_source: I had to pull them off her. How I got my war wound.
563.sl_trans: Moral sem jih sneti z nje. Kako sem dobil svojo vojno rano.

565.en_source: Yes, it all turned into a bit of a wrestle, I'm afraid.
565.sl_trans: Da, bojim se, da se je vse skupaj sprevrglo v borbo.

566.sl_source: Pa saj ni nobene škode, kajne, Lola?
566.en_source: Still, no harm done, eh, Lola?
566.sl_trans: Kljub temu ni nobene škode, kajne, Lola?

567.en_source: Would you go and find these boys, please, Briony?
567.sl_trans: Briony, ali bi šla poiskati te fante?

568.sl_source: Povej jima, da večerja čaka in da sta nevljudna.
568.en_source: Tell them dinner's ready, and where are their manners?
568.sl_trans: Povejte jim, da je večerja pripravljena, in kje so njihove manire?

569.sl_source: Briony, ubogaj, drugače greš v svojo sobo.
569.en_source: Briony, you'll do as you're told, or you'll go straight to your room.
569.sl_trans: Briony, naredila boš, kar ti je bilo rečeno, ali pa boš šla naravnost v svojo sobo.

575.sl_source: Pobegnila bova, ker je Lola grozna in ker hočeva domov.
575.en_source: We are going to run away because Lola is so horrid to us and we want to go home.
575.sl_trans: Pobegnili bomo, ker je Lola tako grozna do nas in ker hočemo domov.

578.en_source: We'll send out some search parties.

581.sl_trans: Je z vami vse v redu?

591.sl_source: Kot si rekla, spolni obsedenec je.
591.en_source: Like you said, he's a sex maniac.
591.sl_trans: Kot ste rekli, je seksualni manijak.

592.sl_source: In sploh še ne veš, kaj se je zgodilo pred večerjo.
592.en_source: And you don't even know what happened before dinner.
592.sl_trans: In sploh ne veste, kaj se je zgodilo pred večerjo.

593.sl_source: Zasačila sem ga, ko je v knjižnici napadel mojo sestro.
593.en_source: I caught him attacking my sister in the library.
593.sl_trans: V knjižnici sem ga ujel, ko je napadel mojo sestro.

594.sl_source: Ne vem, kaj bi naredil, če ne bi prišla.
594.en_source: I don't know what he'd have done if I hadn't come in.
594.sl_trans: Ne vem, kaj bi storil, če ne bi prišel.

598.en_source: He pushed me to the ground.

599.sl_source: In mi z roko pokril oči.
599.en_source: And then he put his hands over my eyes.
599.sl_trans: Nato mi je z rokami prekril oči.

603.sl_source: Poznam ga že vse življenje in videla sem ga.
603.en_source: I've known him my whole life, and I saw him.
603.sl_trans: Poznam ga že vse življenje in videl sem ga.

604.en_source: Because I couldn't say for sure.
604.sl_trans: Ker nisem mogel z gotovostjo trditi.

608.en_source: And she'll be needing a doctor, as well.

609.sl_source: Zdaj je vse v redu, draga.

610.en_source: It's all right now. Is Robbie back yet?
610.sl_trans: Zdaj je vse v redu. Se je Robbie že vrnil?

616.sl_trans: Vem, da je bil to on.

617.sl_trans: Veste, da je bil to on?

619.en_source: Yes, I did, I saw him.
619.sl_trans: Da, videl sem ga, videl sem ga.

621.sl_source: Ja, videla sem ga na svoje oči.
621.en_source: I saw him, I saw him with my own eyes.
621.sl_trans: Videl sem ga, videl sem ga na lastne oči.

623.sl_source: Z bratom sva ju našla pri jezeru.
623.en_source: My brother and I found the two of them down by the lake.
623.sl_trans: Z bratom sva ju našla ob jezeru.

625.sl_source: Jaz ne bi verjela vsega, kar pravi Briony.
625.en_source: I wouldn't necessarily believe everything Briony tells you.
625.sl_trans: Ne bi nujno verjel vsemu, kar vam Briony pove.

630.sl_source: Da bi mu povedal o tem.
630.en_source: To tell him all about it.
630.sl_trans: Da bi mu o tem povedala vse.

631.sl_source: Vem, da ne bi smela odpreti.
631.en_source: I know I shouldn't have opened it.
631.sl_trans: Vem, da je ne bi smela odpreti.

633.sl_source: A si vsaj zdaj naredila prav.
633.en_source: But at least you've done the right thing now.
633.sl_trans: Toda zdaj ste vsaj naredili pravo stvar.

638.sl_source: Rekel sem mu: Lahko sediš tam, vrtiš palce.
638.en_source: I says to him, I says, You can sit down there, twiddling your thumbs.
638.sl_trans: Rekel sem mu: "Lahko sediš tam in si vrtiš palce.

639.sl_source: Čakaš, da ti odpihne glavo, če hočeš.
639.en_source: Waiting to get your head blown off, if you want to.
639.sl_trans: Čakajte, da vam raznese glavo, če želite.

648.sl_source: Med umikom so napadli tanki in odrezan sem bil od svoje enote.
648.en_source: When the retreat started, Panzers attacked, and I was separated from my unit
648.sl_trans: Ko se je začel umik, so me napadli panzerji in bil sem ločen od svoje enote.

649.en_source: So it's true, the English are retreating
649.sl_trans: Torej je res, da se Angleži umikajo

650.en_source: We'll be gone at first light

651.sl_source: Toliko let smo se borili, izgubili toliko mrtvih, in zdaj so Nemci spet v Franciji.
651.en_source: We fought all those years, lost all those dead, now the Germans are in France again
651.sl_trans: Vsa ta leta smo se borili, izgubili vse mrtve, zdaj so Nemci spet v Franciji.

652.sl_source: Vrnili se bomo in jih pregnali.
652.en_source: We will come back we will throw them out
652.sl_trans: Vrnili se bomo in jih vrgli ven.

656.sl_source: Kako pa takle gospodič, ki zna francosko, zaide med navadne vojake?
656.en_source: How come a toff like you, talks French and everything, ends up a private?
656.sl_trans: Kako to, da takšen bedak, kot si ti, ki govori francosko in vse ostalo, konča kot zasebnik?

657.sl_source: Če se prijaviš naravnost iz zapora, nisi primeren za častniško urjenje.
657.en_source: Not eligible for officers' training if you join direct from prison.
657.sl_trans: Če se pridružite neposredno iz zapora, niste upravičeni do usposabljanja za častnike.

661.sl_source: Ali ostanem v zaporu ali pa grem v vojsko.

661.sl_trans: Ostani v zaporu ali se pridruži vojski.

662.sl_source: In uradno, še zdaleč nisem gospodič.
662.en_source: And for the record, the last thing I am is a toff.
662.sl_trans: In za nameček, zadnja stvar, ki jo imam, je premetenost.

668.sl_trans: Žal mi je, ne morem se spomniti.

674.sl_trans: Gospodinja je nesramna in strašno radovedna.

678.en_source: I've got to go back to the hospital in half an hour.
678.sl_trans: Čez pol ure se moram vrniti v bolnišnico.

679.sl_source: Si kaj v stiku z družino?
679.en_source: Have you been in touch with your family?
679.sl_trans: Ste v stiku s svojo družino?

680.sl_source: Ne, Saj sem rekla, da nočem.
680.en_source: No, I told you I wouldn't.
680.sl_trans: Ne, rekel sem ti, da ne bom.

681.sl_trans: Prejšnji teden je Leon čakal pred bolnišnico, jaz pa sem se potisnila mimo njega.

683.sl_trans: Robbie, ali nisi prebral mojih pisem?

684.sl_source: Če bi te smela obiskovati, če bi mi dovolili vsak dan, bi bila vsak dan tam.

684.sl_trans: Če bi mi dovolili, da te obiščem, če bi mi dovolili vsak dan, bi bil vsak dan tam.

685.sl_source: Če vse, kar imava, temelji na nekaj trenutkih v knjižnici pred tremi leti in pol, potem ne vem.
685.en_source: If all we have rests on a few moments in a library three and a half years ago, then I'm not sure,
685.sl_trans: Če vse, kar imamo, temelji na nekaj trenutkih v knjižnici pred tremi leti in pol, potem nisem prepričan,

686.sl_trans: Moj prijatelj ima hišo na obali.

687.sl_source: Lahko si jo sposodiva, ko boš prihodnjič na dopustu.
687.en_source: Said we can borrow it when you're next on leave.
687.sl_trans: Rekel je, da si ga lahko izposodimo, ko boš naslednjič na dopustu.

688.sl_source: Bele skodle in modri okenski okvirji.
688.en_source: White clapboard with blue-painted window frames.
688.sl_trans: Bela kritina z modro pobarvanimi okenskimi okvirji.

689.en_source: I hope this bus never comes.
689.sl_trans: Upam, da ta avtobus nikoli ne bo prišel.

691.sl_source: Da boš o nečem razmišljal, ko te ne bo.
691.en_source: Something to think of while you're away.
691.sl_trans: Nekaj, o čemer lahko razmišljate, ko vas ni doma.

693.en_source: Some poor sod's gonna catch a packet.
693.sl_trans: Nekdo od ubogih bo ujel paket.

695.sl_source: Briony je nekako našla moj naslov in mi pisala.
695.en_source: Briony found my address somehow, and sent a letter.
695.sl_trans: Briony je nekako našla moj naslov in mi poslala pismo.

696.sl_source: Prvo presenečenje je bilo, da ni šla na Cambridge.
696.en_source: The first surprise was she didn't go up to Cambridge.
696.sl_trans: Prvo presenečenje je bilo, da ni odšla v Cambridge.

697.sl_source: V moji nekdanji bolnici se uči za sestro.
697.en_source: She's doing nurse's training at my old hospital.
697.sl_trans: V moji stari bolnišnici se usposablja za medicinsko sestro.

698.sl_source: Mislim, da to počne za pokoro.
698.en_source: I think she may be doing this as some kind of penance.
698.sl_trans: Mislim, da to počne kot nekakšno pokoro.

699.sl_source: Pravi, da začenja razumeti, kaj je storila in kaj je to pomenilo.
699.en_source: She says she's beginning to get the full grasp of what she did, and what it meant.
699.sl_trans: Pravi, da se začenja zavedati, kaj je storila in kaj je to pomenilo.

700.sl_source: Rada bi prišla na pogovor z mano.
700.en_source: She wants to come and talk to me.
700.sl_trans: Želi priti in se pogovoriti z mano.

707.sl_source: Sovražim jih bolj kot vse jebene Nemce!
707.en_source: I hate them worse than all the fucking Germans put together!
707.sl_trans: Sovražim jih bolj kot vse zajebane Nemce skupaj!

708.sl_source: Težko se boš vrnil v Anglijo samo v nogavicah.

708.sl_trans: V nogavicah se boš težko vrnil v Anglijo.

709.sl_source: Pridi, partner, obleči bi se morala.
709.en_source: Come on, pal, you should be getting dressed.
709.sl_trans: Daj, kolega, moral bi se obleči.

710.sl_source: Bi me rešil, če bi padla noter?
710.en_source: If I fell in, would you save me?
710.sl_trans: Bi me rešili, če bi padel v vodo?

716.en_source: That's an incredibly bloody stupid thing to do.

718.sl_source: Ne veš, da bi lahko zlahka utonila?
718.en_source: Don't you know how easily you could have drowned?
718.sl_trans: Ali ne veste, kako zlahka bi se lahko utopili?

721.en_source: You could have killed us both.

722.en_source: Is that your idea of a joke?

723.sl_source: Hvala, da si mi rešil življenje.
723.en_source: I want to thank you for saving my life.
723.sl_trans: Zahvaljujem se vam, ker ste mi rešili življenje.

724.en_source: I will be eternally grateful to you.

728.sl_source: Švaba, pridi in se nas loti v jebenem South Endu.
728.en_source: Jerry, come and have a go at us in fucking South End.
728.sl_trans: Jerry, pridi in se z nami poigraj v prekaljenem South Endu.

729.sl_trans: Ali še bolje, na Trafalgarskem trgu.

730.sl_source: Tu nihče ne govori po naše.
730.en_source: No one speaks the fucking lingo out here.
730.sl_trans: Tukaj nihče ne govori tega jebenega žargona.

731.en_source: You can't say, Pass the biscuit, or Where's me hand grenade?
731.sl_trans: Ne morete reči: Podaj piškote ali Kje je moja ročna granata?

735.en_source: We fight in France and the French fucking hate us.
735.sl_trans: Vojskujemo se v Franciji in Francozi nas sovražijo.

736.en_source: Make me Home Secretary, I'll sort this out in a fucking minute.
736.sl_trans: Naredite me za notranjega ministra, to bom uredil v trenutku.

737.en_source: We got India and Africa, right?

738.sl_source: Švabi lahko dobijo Francijo in Belgijo in vse drugo, kar še hočejo.
738.en_source: Jerry can have France and Belgium and wherever else they want.
738.sl_trans: Jerry ima lahko Francijo, Belgijo in še kje.

739.sl_source: Kdo je pa kdaj bil na Poljskem?
739.en_source: Who's fucking ever been to Poland?
739.sl_trans: Kdo je bil kdaj na Poljskem?

740.sl_trans: Vse je odvisno od prostora, imperija.

741.sl_source: Če hočejo večji imperij, jim dajmo to luknjo, mi obdržimo svoje, in zadeva je v hipu rešena.
741.en_source: They want more empire, give 'em this shithole, we keep ours, and it's Bob's your uncle and Fanny's your fucking aunt!
741.sl_trans: Hočejo več imperija, dajte jim to luknjo, mi obdržimo svojo, in to je Bob je tvoj stric in Fanny je tvoja jebena teta!

745.sl_source: Tista, ki sem jo načrtoval na tistem večernem sprehodu.
745.en_source: The one I had been planning on that evening walk.
745.sl_trans: Tistega, ki sem ga načrtoval na večernem sprehodu.

746.sl_source: Spet lahko postanem človek, ki je šel čez surreyjski park ob mraku, v najboljši obleki, bahav zaradi življenjskih obetov.
746.en_source: I can become again the man who once crossed the Surrey park at dusk in my best suit, swaggering on the promise of life.
746.sl_trans: Spet lahko postanem človek, ki je nekoč ob mraku v svoji najboljši obleki prečkal park Surrey in se razburkal zaradi obljube življenja.

747.sl_source: Človek, ki se je z jasnostjo strasti ljubil s tabo v knjižnici.
747.en_source: The man who, with the clarity of passion, made love to you in the library.
747.sl_trans: Moški, ki se je z jasnostjo strasti ljubil s teboj v knjižnici.

749.sl_source: Vrnil se bom, te našel, ljubil in se poročil s tabo.
749.en_source: I will return, find you, love you, marry you.
749.sl_trans: Vrnil se bom, te našel, te ljubil, se poročil.

753.en_source: It's like something out of the Bible.

755.sl_trans: Dajmo, naj vsi pospravijo to zmešnjavo.

757.sl_trans: Ali nam lahko poveste, kaj naj bi počeli?

761.en_source: A few made it in yesterday.

763.sl_trans: Ko so potopili ladjo Lancastria, so izgubili 3.000 mož.

764.en_source: High command, in its infinite wisdom, is denying us air cover.
764.sl_trans: Vrhovno poveljstvo nam v svoji neskončni modrosti odreka zračno kritje.

766.sl_source: Veste, stvar je v tem, da me pričakujejo.
766.en_source: No, look, the thing is, you see, I'm expected back, you see.
766.sl_trans: Ne, glej, stvar je v tem, da me pričakujejo nazaj.

768.en_source: You'll have to wait your turn.

769.en_source: Just be grateful you're not wounded.

773.en_source: You're best off out of it.
773.sl_trans: Najbolje je, da ga ne uporabljate.

778.en_source: I have to get something to drink.

781.en_source: He's gone all grey, can you see?

784.en_source: All I want's a cup of tea now.
784.sl_trans: Zdaj si želim le skodelico čaja.

790.en_source: The long and the short and the tall

791.sl_source: Jebeš narednike in podčastnike, jebeš desetnike in njihove pankrtske sinove
791.en_source: Fuck all the Sergeants and Fuck all the corporals and their bastard sons
791.sl_trans: Jebem vse seržante in jebem vse kaprale in njihove sinove.

793.sl_source: ko se plazijo na svoja ležišča
793.en_source: As back to their billets they crawl
793.sl_trans: Ko se vračajo nazaj v svoja ležišča, se plazijo

794.sl_source: Na tej strani morja ne boš napredoval
794.en_source: You'll get no promotion this side of the ocean
794.sl_trans: Na tej strani oceana ne boš dobil promocije

795.en_source: So cheer up, my lads Fuck 'em all!
795.sl_trans: Zato se razveselite, fantje, jebite jih vse!

808.en_source: Hey, what have you done with your boots?
808.sl_trans: Hej, kaj ste naredili s svojimi škornji?

809.en_source: Look, you're sure you're feeling all right?
809.sl_trans: Poglej, si prepričan, da se dobro počutiš?

811.sl_source: Sprašujem se, če je plaža res najboljši kraj za večerjo.
811.en_source: Now I'm wondering whether the beach really is the best place for dinner.
811.sl_trans: Zdaj se sprašujem, ali je plaža res najboljši kraj za večerjo.

819.sl_source: Stara koča z belimi skodlami in modrimi okenskimi okviri.
819.en_source: An old cottage with white clapboards and blue-painted window frames.
819.sl_trans: Stara koča z belimi opažnimi deskami in modro pobarvanimi okenskimi okvirji.

821.en_source: That's right, that's where we're going.

831.sl_source: Pokrij se, da ti bo toplo.
831.en_source: Tuck yourself in, keep yourself warm.
831.sl_trans: Stisnite se k sebi in se ogrejte.

832.en_source: Chew on a bit of this.

833.sl_source: Ampak potihem, drugače bodo hoteli še oni.
833.en_source: But quiet like, or they'll all be wanting some.
833.sl_trans: Toda tiho, saj si bodo vsi želeli nekaj.

846.en_source: Some of the lads are getting a bit peeved.
846.sl_trans: Nekateri fantje so postali malce jezni.

848.en_source: Thing is, I've decided to stay on for a bit.
848.sl_trans: Odločil sem se, da še nekaj časa ostanem.

849.sl_source: Z nekom se dobim in vedno jo puščam čakati.
849.en_source: I'm meeting someone, and I'm always keeping her waiting.
849.sl_trans: Z nekom se srečujem in vedno jo pustim čakati.

852.en_source: I went out for a Jimmy Riddle just now.
852.sl_trans: Ravnokar sem šel po Jimmyja Riddlea.

854.sl_source: Na plaži so se vzeli v roke.
854.en_source: They're getting themselves sorted out down on the beach.

855.sl_source: Ladje so se vrnile in tip iz Buffa nas bo ob sedmih odpeljal dol.
855.en_source: The boats are back, and a geezer from the Buffs is marching us down at 7:00.
855.sl_trans: Čolni so se vrnili in ob 7:00 nas bo nekdo iz skupine Buffs pospremil dol.

858.sl_source: Zato še malo zaspi, pa ne vpij več.
858.en_source: So get some more sleep, and no more of your bleeding shouting.
858.sl_trans: Zato se še malo naspite in ne kričite več.

861.sl_trans: Zbudite me pred 7:00, ali bi me zbudili?

863.sl_source: Niti besede ne boš slišal od mene.
863.en_source: You won't hear another word from me.
863.sl_trans: Od mene ne boste slišali niti besede več.

866.sl_source: Kolesca postelj morajo biti poravnana in obrnjena navznoter.
866.en_source: Bed castors should be lined up and pointing inwards.
866.sl_trans: Koleščki postelje morajo biti poravnani in usmerjeni navznoter.

867.en_source: I found three yesterday that weren't.
867.sl_trans: Včeraj sem našel tri, ki niso bili.

869.en_source: Which of you were responsible for putting away the blankets today?
869.sl_trans: Kdo od vas je bil danes odgovoren za pospravljanje odej?

871.sl_source: Najbrž ne veste, kaj ste naredili narobe, kaj?
871.en_source: I don't suppose you can tell us what you did wrong?
871.sl_trans: Verjetno nam ne morete povedati, kaj ste naredili narobe?

873.en_source: Labels are folded to the inside, are they not?
873.sl_trans: Etikete so zložene na notranji strani, ali ne?

876.en_source: Nurse Tallis, I'll see you in my office.
876.sl_trans: Medicinska sestra Tallis, vidimo se v moji pisarni.

877.en_source: The rest of you are excused.

878.sl_source: Vam to delo sploh kaj pomeni, Tallis?
878.en_source: Is this job at all important to you, Tallis?
878.sl_trans: Ali vam je to delo sploh pomembno, Tallis?

880.sl_source: Včeraj ste bili začasno dodeljeni na moški kirurški oddelek.
880.en_source: Yesterday, you were seconded to men's surgical.
880.sl_trans: Včeraj ste bili napoteni na moško kirurgijo.

881.sl_source: Ko se je pacient zbudil iz narkoze, je bilo prvo, kar je naredil, da je vprašal za Briony.
881.en_source: When your patient came round from his anaesthetic, it seems the first thing he did was to ask for Briony.
881.sl_trans: Ko je vaš pacient prišel po anesteziji, je menda najprej vprašal po Briony.

890.en_source: This is the BBC Home Service.

892.sl_source: BEK se s francoskimi zavezniki obupno bojuje na severnem delu zahodne fronte.
892.en_source: The BEF, with their French allies, are fighting a desperate battle in the northern zone of the Western Front.
892.sl_trans: BEF se skupaj s francoskimi zavezniki obupno bori na severnem območju zahodne fronte.

893.sl_source: Zavezniške sile se dobro držijo in morala je visoka.
893.en_source: The Allied Forces have not lost cohesion, and their morale is high.
893.sl_trans: Zavezniške sile niso izgubile kohezije in njihova morala je visoka.

894.sl_source: RAF še vedno nudi vso podporo zavezniški vojni na severovzhodu Francije in Belgije.
894.en_source: The RAF continues to give all the support in its power to the Allied armies in northeastern France and Belgium.
894.sl_trans: RAF še naprej z vso močjo podpira zavezniško vojsko v severovzhodni Franciji in Belgiji.

895.sl_source: Železnice, ceste, mostove in sovražnikove čete so včeraj neprestano napadali.
895.en_source: Railways, roads, bridges and enemy troops have been continuously attacked, yesterday...
895.sl_trans: Železnice, ceste, mostovi in sovražnikove enote so bile nenehno napadane, včeraj...

897.sl_source: Z levico nikoli nisem znala striči.
897.en_source: I never could make the scissors work with my left hand.
897.sl_trans: Škarij nikoli nisem mogel uporabljati z levo roko.

898.en_source: Mummy always did it for me.
898.sl_trans: Mami je to vedno naredila zame.

905.sl_source: Fiona, na smrt si me prestrašila.
905.en_source: Fiona, I almost jumped out of my skin.
905.sl_trans: Fiona, skoraj sem skočila iz kože.

906.sl_source: Tu se torej skrivaš, ko ugasnejo luči.
906.en_source: So this is where you duck to after lights out.
906.sl_trans: Zato se po ugasnitvi luči odpravite tja.

907.sl_source: Mislila sem, da si sredi viharne romance.
907.en_source: I thought you might be in the middle of some tempestuous romance.
907.sl_trans: Mislil sem, da ste morda sredi burne romance.

908.en_source: Don't you freeze to death up here?
908.sl_trans: Ali ne zmrzneš do smrti tukaj zgoraj?

910.sl_source: Misliš, da bodo vse to zbombardirali in bo izginilo?
910.en_source: Do you think all of this will be bombed and just disappear?
910.sl_trans: Ali menite, da bo vse to bombardirano in bo preprosto izginilo?

911.en_source: Do you write about Sister Drummond?

915.sl_trans: Raje bi, da tega ne storite.

917.sl_source: Ne vem, zakaj pišeš zgodbo, če je ne pustiš nikomur prebrati.
917.en_source: I don't see any point in writing a story if you're not going to let anyone read it.
917.sl_trans: Ne vidim smisla v pisanju zgodbe, če je ne boš nikomur dal prebrati.

921.sl_source: O mladi in neumni deklici, ki iz svoje sobe vidi nekaj, česar ne razume, misli pa, da razume.
921.en_source: It's about a young girl, a young and foolish girl, who sees something from her bedroom window which she doesn't understand, but she thinks she does.
921.sl_trans: Zgodba govori o mladem in nespametnem dekletu, ki skozi okno svoje spalnice vidi nekaj, česar ne razume, vendar misli, da razume.

922.en_source: I probably won't ever finish it.
922.sl_trans: Verjetno je ne bom nikoli dokončal.

923.en_source: I look at you, Tallis, and you're so mysterious.
923.sl_trans: Gledam te, Tallis, in si tako skrivnosten.

925.en_source: Do you know what I decided tonight?
925.sl_trans: Veste, kaj sem se odločil nocoj?

927.sl_source: Ne bi se mogla poročiti z moškim, ki ni bil v Kraljevi mornarici.
927.en_source: I could never marry a man who wasn't in the Royal Navy.
927.sl_trans: Nikoli se ne bi mogla poročiti z moškim, ki ni bil v kraljevi mornarici.

933.sl_source: Prosim ne vrzi tega stran, ne da bi prebrala.
933.en_source: Please don't throw this away without reading it.
933.sl_trans: Prosimo, ne zavrzite tega, ne da bi ga prebrali.

934.sl_source: Kot boš razbrala iz papirja, sem tu v St. Thomasu in se učim za sestro.
934.en_source: As you'll have seen from the notepaper, I'm here at St Thomas doing my nurses' training.
934.sl_trans: Kot ste videli iz beležke, sem tukaj v St. Thomasu, kjer opravljam usposabljanje za medicinske sestre.

935.sl_source: Sklenila sem, da ne grem v Cambridge.
935.en_source: I decided not to take up my place at Cambridge.
935.sl_trans: Odločil sem se, da se ne bom vpisal na Cambridge.

937.en_source: I decided I wanted to make myself useful.
937.sl_trans: Odločil sem se, da želim biti koristen.

939.sl_source: V časopisu piše, da se vojska strateško pomika nazaj.
939.en_source: It says in the newspaper the Army are making strategic withdrawals.
939.sl_trans: V časopisu piše, da se vojska strateško umika.

942.sl_source: Naj še tako garam, naj delam še tako dolgo, ne morem ubežati temu, kar sem storila in kar je pomenilo.
942.en_source: No matter how hard I work, no matter how long the hours, I can't escape from what I did and what it meant.
942.sl_trans: Ne glede na to, kako trdo delam in kako dolge so moje ure, ne morem pobegniti od tega, kar sem storil, in od tega, kaj je to pomenilo.

943.sl_source: Šele zdaj počasi razumem polni pomen tega.
943.en_source: I am only now beginning to grasp the full extent of what I did and what it meant.
943.sl_trans: Šele zdaj se zavedam, kaj vse sem storil in kaj je to pomenilo.

944.sl_source: Cee, prosim, piši mi in reci, da se lahko srečava.
944.en_source: Cee, please write and tell me we can meet.
944.sl_trans: Cee, prosim, napiši mi in povej, da se lahko srečamo.
